method.name: i_cal_time_null_time

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalTimetype

method.comment: Create a default time which is an epoch time

method.name: i_cal_time_null_date

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalTimetype

method.comment: Create a null date, which indicates no time has been set

method.name: i_cal_time_current_time_with_zone

parameter.name: zone
parameter.comment: The timezone used to create a #ICalTimetype according to the current time

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalTimetype

method.comment: Create a #ICalTimetype according to the timezone and current time

method.name: i_cal_time_today

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalTimetype

method.comment: Create a #ICalTimetype representing today

method.name: i_cal_time_from_timet_with_zone

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The seconds past since epoch time

parameter.name: is_date
parameter.comment: Whether it is a date type, 1 if yes, 0 if not.

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalTimetype

method.comment: Convert seconds past UNIX epoch to a timetype, using timezones.

method.name: i_cal_time_from_string

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalTimetype

method.comment: create a time from an ISO format string

method.name: i_cal_time_from_day_of_year

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalTimetype

method.comment: Create a new time, given a day of year and a year.

method.name: i_cal_time_as_timet

returns.comment: the time as seconds past the UNIX epoch

method.comment: Return the time as seconds past the UNIX epoch

method.name: i_cal_time_as_timet_with_zone

returns.comment: the time as seconds past the UNIX epoch

method.comment: Return the time as seconds past the UNIX epoch, using timezones.

method.name: i_cal_time_as_ical_string_r

returns.comment: The string representation

method.comment: Return a string represention of the time, in RFC2445 format.

method.name: i_cal_time_get_timezone

returns.comment: The timezone information

method.comment: Return the timezone

method.name: i_cal_time_set_timezone

returns.comment: The #ICalTimetype after being set

method.comment: Set the timezone

method.name: i_cal_time_get_tzid

returns.comment: The tzid of #ICalTimetype, or NULL if floating type

method.comment: Return the tzid, or NULL for a floating time

method.name: i_cal_time_day_of_year

returns.comment: the day of the year of the given time

method.comment: Return the day of the year of the given time

method.name: i_cal_time_day_of_week

returns.comment: the day of the week of the given time. Sunday is 1.

method.comment: Return the day of the week of the given time. Sunday is 1

method.name: i_cal_time_start_doy_week

parameter.name: fdow
parameter.comment: The first day of the week

returns.comment: the day of the year for the Sunday of the week that the given time is within.

method.comment: Return the day of the year for the first day of the week that the given time is within.

method.name: i_cal_time_week_number

returns.comment: the week number for the week the given time is within.

method.comment: Return the week number for the week the given time is within.

method.name: i_cal_time_is_null_time

returns.comment: Whether @tt is null_time. 1 if yes, 0 if not.

method.comment: Return true of the time is null.

method.name: i_cal_time_is_valid_time

returns.comment: Whether @tt is null_time. 1 if yes, 0 if not.

method.comment: Return true of the time is null.

method.name: i_cal_time_is_date

returns.comment: true if time is of DATE type, false if DATE-TIME.

method.comment: Returns true if time is of DATE type, false if DATE-TIME.

method.name: i_cal_time_is_utc

returns.comment: true if time is relative to UTC zone.

method.comment: Returns true if time is relative to UTC zone.

method.name: i_cal_time_compare

returns.comment: -1, 0, or 1 to indicate that a less than b, a==b or a larger than b.

method.comment: Return -1, 0, or 1 to indicate that a less than b, a==b or a larger than b.

method.name: i_cal_time_compare_date_only

returns.comment: -1, 0, or 1 to indicate that a less than b, a==b or a larger than b.

method.comment: like icaltime_compare, but only use the date parts.

method.name: i_cal_time_compare_date_only_tz

returns.comment: -1, 0, or 1 to indicate that a less than b, a==b or a larger than b.

method.comment: like icaltime_compare_tz, but only use the date parts.

method.name: i_cal_time_adjust
method.comment: like icaltime_compare_tz, but only use the date parts.

method.name: i_cal_time_normalize

returns.comment: The #ICalTimetype normalized

method.comment: Normalize the icaltime, so that all fields are within the normal range.

method.name: i_cal_time_convert_to_zone

returns.comment: The converted #ICalTimetype

method.comment: Convert tt, of timezone tzid, into a utc time. Does nothing if the time is already UTC.

method.name: i_cal_time_days_in_month

returns.comment: The number of days in the target month in the target year.

method.comment: Get the number of days in the target month in the target year.

method.name: i_cal_time_days_is_leap_year

returns.comment: 1 if @year is leap year, 0 if not.

method.comment: Check whether a year is a leap year.

method.name: i_cal_time_days_in_year

returns.comment: Days in this year.

method.comment: Return the number of days in this year.

method.name: i_cal_time_span_new

returns.comment: The newly create #ICalTimeSpan

method.comment: Create a new #ICalTimeSpan.

method.name: i_cal_time_span_overlaps

returns.comment: Whether these two span are overlapped.

method.comment: Check whether two spans overlap.

method.name: i_cal_time_span_contains

returns.comment: Whether one #ICalTimeSpan is contained in another #ICalTimeSpan.

method.comment: Check whether one #ICalTimeSpan is contained in another #ICalTimeSpan.

method.name: i_cal_time_add

returns.comment: The #ICalTimetype results. The native object is the same. But since it is a bare object, so it won't cause segmentation.

method.comment: Add a time duration on the time.

method.name: i_cal_time_subtract

returns.comment: The #ICalDuarationType between two #ICalTimetype.

method.comment: Get the duration between two time.
